column6: Newly renovated w/ incredible views from large private deck in ideal central location convenient to everything. Hip neighborhood of restaurants, bars, coffee house and shops. On Bayou trails, park entrance 3 blocks. Historic 1800s exterior & stylish modern, sunny, open-concept interior w gorgeous mid-century furniture. Private entrance; reserved driveway; lighted walkway and stairs. Shared laundry. Grocery, general stores close. Walk downtown, theater district, light rail. I45 or I10 4 blocks.
column9: BIG gorgeous renovated 1BR; Central locale; Views!
